DataElement.preferredName: White Light Endoscopy Sentinel Lymph Node Biopsy Planned Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date of the planned white light endoscopy/sentinel lymph node biopsy.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: White Light Endoscopy Sentinel Lymph Node Biopsy Planned Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Endoscopic examination that uses full-spectrum visible light. An image is captured using a standard color camera, sensitive only to red, green and blue spectral components, replicating the vision of the human eye._Surgical removal and examination of the sentinel node, the lymph node which is first in receiving the lymphatic drainage of a specified anatomic location and is most likely to be affected by the lymphatic spread of cancer._An instance of an event or incident that is intended to take place.

ObjectClass.preferredName: White Light Endoscopy Sentinel Lymph Node Biopsy
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Endoscopic examination that uses full-spectrum visible light. An image is captured using a standard color camera, sensitive only to red, green and blue spectral components, replicating the vision of the human eye.:Surgical removal and examination of the sentinel node, the lymph node which is first in receiving the lymphatic drainage of a specified anatomic location and is most likely to be affected by the lymphatic spread of cancer.

Concepts.definition: Endoscopic examination that uses full-spectrum visible light. An image is captured using a standard color camera, sensitive only to red, green and blue spectral components, replicating the vision of the human eye.

Surgical removal and examination of the sentinel node, the lymph node which is first in receiving the lymphatic drainage of a specified anatomic location and is most likely to be affected by the lymphatic spread of cancer.

Property.preferredDefinition: An instance of an event or incident that is intended to take place.

Concepts.definition: An instance of an event or incident that is intended to take place.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
